static_fields.name: Discover Uruga 31mm Steel | Minase Watches | Made in Japan
static_fields.description: Uruga 31mm Steel is powered with a high quality Swiss movement, every steel parts is hand-polished with the Sallaz (sarazu) technique.

hasVariant.name: Uruga 31mm Steel - Champagne bicolor
hasVariant.description: The Uruga 31mm Steel model was specifically designed for ladies. Inspired by gems setting, it is an elegant version of the 42mm model with highly polished clamps. In alternance to the indexes, the dial is decorated with 6 genuine diamonds.

offers.description: The Uruga 31mm Steel model was specifically designed for ladies. Inspired by gems setting, it is an elegant version of the 42mm model with highly polished clamps. In alternance to the indexes, the dial is decorated with 6 genuine diamonds.
